title: Lifeleech stack or no stack?
body: Does it work to Stack multiple lifeleech Items or is there a Cap for Lifeleech or something?

replies.body:
If there is "unique" you cant stack (like passiv on BC)
If there is no unique you can stack (like improved healing from several items)
